title: Evidence-based Complementary and Alternative Medicine: eCAM
author: December

Mission Statement: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (eCAM) is an international, peer-reviewed journal that seeks to understand the sources and to encourage rigorous research in this new, yet ancient world of complementary and alternative medicine.
